title: Bug 4974: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: Currently, the classpath and output location can be set separately, requiring two separate operations.
EB: The classpath and output location should be set as one combined operation. This means that users should be able to configure both the classpath and output location in a single step.
SR:
1. Open the settings or preferences menu.
2. Navigate to the classpath / output location section.
3. Specify the desired classpath and output location.
4. Save the settings.
5. Verify that the classpath and output location are now set correctly.
